sentence: Our room was a deluxe beachfront and it had all the mod coms plus great comfort with a huge bed

The location at the end of the quiet bay was the best spot on the beach with calm waters great view access to kayaks and stand up paddle boards and a short walk to the busier louder part of Kata Beach
The Re Ka Ta beach club which is part of the hotel has a fantastic infinity edge pool overlooking the beach plus plenty of sun lounges and day beds to loll away the hours
What could be better than sitting by the sparking cool infinity pool overlooking the beautiful and safe Kata beach
Lots of restaurants around the hotel and a really cool reggae bar on the beach to wind down with
Location right on the beach and excellent breakfast in a nice terrasse
Room was great ocean view enormous bed for the 3 of us and overall had a great vibe with the beach club
Great location right on the beach and central
it is great to play and swim on the beach we had 2 suites directly with best view of the sea and that was amazing
Very helpful and friendly stafit is expensive and Kata beach itself does not have the greatest selection of shops and restaurants
you are paying for vererable hotel and location on the beach room was decent but a bit of letdown after staying at a 5 star international hotel in Bangkok for half the price
We had a Family Seaview Suite and the sand literally came up to the door
there is something special about waking up to sea breeze putting on your swimsuit opening your door and jumping into the ocean
Get up in the morning and see the amount of garbage left on the sand by the ocean
The Boathouse is like a home on the beach but with all the luxuries

Feels like they wanted to create a high end beach club but spend just a bit too little on it and have too little attention to detail only one row of beds with proper size covers and the other rows have some cheap plastic covers that are too small

The lady explained things to us and tokher time going through breakfast times etcWe had a deluxe beachfront room which was not very private if that is what you want then I suggest something else as the rooms open up onto the pool and all face onto each other
Reservation needed if you would like to sit by the terrace facing the beautiful Kata Beach
The only downside was that the Ska bar on the beach played loud music until about 2 am every night which made sleeping a challenge sometimes
A little pricier than the casual beach places but service and quality are definitely worth it
A touch of sea breeze
Beachfront with 5 star service on Kata beach
A restaurant in s boutique hotel on Kata Beach
